de.fuberlin.wiwiss.d2r.factory
Class DriverFactory

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.ClassLoader
      java.security.SecureClassLoader
          java.net.URLClassLoader
              de.fuberlin.wiwiss.d2r.factory.AbstractFactory
                  de.fuberlin.wiwiss.d2r.factory.DriverFactory
public class DriverFactory
extends AbstractFactory

Factory class used to instantiate instances of JDBC Drivers. Implementations are defined in the factories properties file. Implementations can also be instantiated using the class name and the implementation's classpath.

Version:
$Revision: 1.7 $
Author:
Robert Turner
